name: Officers Quarters Room
longDesc: You have made it to the Officers Quarters and see that you must transit the quarters to one of two doors, North and East, to progress, however, you are wearing prison wear and will surely not be granted safe passage by the Officer standing guard by the East door, the North door is closer but the short stairs to the North door are missing
shortDesc: The Officers Quarters has two exits, an Officer stands guard at the East door and a short staircase leading to the North door is missing
feat1desc: guard having tattoo 6 6 6 on the back of his neck
feat1interactSuccess: Congratulations, you have downed the guard and may pass through the door East, you notice the guard has a tattoo, 666 on the back of his neck
feat1interactComplete: the door to room 10 is now open
feat1interactFail: your shot has missed, you have been arrested and are now in the brig
feat2desc: ledge at door with missing staircase
feat2interactSuccess: Good job, you've made it through the door to the North
feat2interactComplete: the room has not changed, the door to the East remains guarded
feat2interactFail: Nope, you have not made it through the door to the North
